SELECT MU.MUSIC_NO, MU.MEMBER_ID, ME.MEMBER_NICKNAME, MU.MUSIC_TITLE, MU.MUSIC_CONTENT, MU.MUSIC_SAVENAME, MU.MUSIC_REALNAME, MU.MUSIC_DATE FROM MUSIC MU JOIN MEMBER ME ON MU.MEMBER_ID = ME.MEMBER_ID WHERE MU.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
